protein.specific_function: Mediates the uptake of the cationic amino acids arginine, lysine and ornithine in a sodium-independent manner

reference.reference_text: Vekony N, Wolf S, Boissel JP, Gnauert K, Closs EI: Human cationic amino acid transporter hCAT-3 is preferentially expressed in peripheral tissues. Biochemistry. 2001 Oct 16;40(41):12387-94.
